Name: Aldani (Lobsterfolk)
Traits: Amphibious. The aldani can breathe air and water.
Actions: Multiattack. The aldani makes two attacks with its claws. Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The aldani has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
